message.body: $TSLA "Dubai takes delivery of their first 50 Tesla vehicles to create a ‚Äòself-driving‚Äô taxi service" https://electrek.co/2017/09/18/tesla-vehicles-dubai-taxi-service/?pushup=1

links.title: Dubai takes delivery of their first 50 Tesla vehicles to create a 'self-driving' taxi service
links.description: Tesla made a big deal of its launch in Dubai and the United Arab Emirates earlier this year. With the launch in the region, Tesla signed a deal to supply 200 Model S/X vehicles with 'fully self-driving-capability' to Dubai's taxi company. This week, they delivered the first 50 of those vehicles.

links.title: Porsche's stunning Tesla rival will arrive in 2019 and cost $85,000
links.description: More details are emerging about Porsche's highly anticipated electric car, dubbed the Mission E. Porsche's chairman, Oliver Blume, told CAR Magazine the vehicle will go on sale by the end of 2019 and will be "priced like entry-level Panamera," which begins at $85,000.

links.title: Nissan to Hyundai Keen on India's $203 Million Order for EVs
links.description: India has floated tender for 10,000 EVs for use by government Last date for bid submission is Sept. 22, official says , . and are among companies interested in supplying India 10,000 electric cars as part of the country's efforts to reduce emissions and curb fuel imports, a government official said.
